about.title: THE BARBERSHOP
about.desc1: Marques Jr is a barbershop located in the heart of Cascais, offering a relaxed and welcoming environment, making it the perfect place for you to unwind while taking care of yourself.
about.desc2: In order to provide personal care in this environment, our team consists of high-quality professionals who are ready to welcome you and provide excellent service.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.desc_1: Executing this cut requires skill and sensitivity, using various techniques. Aimed at contemporary men.
services.desc_2: With precision and modernity, our clipper cuts offer convenience and contemporary style for men who value their appearance.
services.desc_3: Discover the pleasure of barber therapy, a unique experience that combines technique and relaxation. Precise care, tailored for modern men who value excellence in personal care.
services.desc_4: Enjoy the art of beard care, a unique experience that combines technique and well-being. Specialized treatment, adapted for modern men seeking excellence in personal maintenance.
services.desc_5: Explore the unique experience of barber therapy, where personalized care turns into moments of relaxation. A proposal dedicated to those who value well-being and seek excellence in their style.
services.desc_6: Discover the art of eyebrow shaping with a razor, a refined technique with personalized molding, providing a unique expression for those seeking perfection in detail.
services.desc_7: Enhance your look with the art of eyebrow shaping with tweezers. Precision and delicacy come together to create a unique molding, highlighting natural beauty and enhancing your personal expression.
services.desc_8: Custom touch-up post-cut, adapting lines according to the client's preference. From the 'fade' to the sides, we ensure an impeccable look, ideal for those who have recently had a haircut.

cta.title: schedule online
cta.desc: Schedule your appointment online and enjoy convenience and peace of mind. Secure your time slot without leaving home, providing a convenient and worry-free experience.
